Description: At ILLIYEEN, The High-End Retailer, we are looking for a passionate and professional Sales Associate to join our team at our new Display Center in UAE. As a Sales Associate, you will be responsible for providing exceptional customer service while upholding the standards and values of BYSL Global.Job Responsibilities:● Greet customers and assist them with their needs and preferences● Demonstrate product features and benefits, answer questions, and provide recommendations● Stay updated on product knowledge, sales promotions, store events, and Customer Loyalty Programs● Arrange and replenish merchandise displays, ensure proper labeling and pricing, and follow inventory control procedures● Process transactions, handle payments, balance cash registers and issue receipts● Handle customer complaints, requests, and returns in a polite and professional manner● Build rapport with customers and provide them with a memorable shopping experience● Keep the store neat, tidy, and organized at all times● Receiving and storing the delivery of large amounts of stock● Be involved in stock control and management● Reporting discrepancies and problems to the supervisor● Follow company policies and procedures, as well as health and safety regulations● Working within established guidelines, particularly with brands.● Be responsible for security within the store and being on the lookout for shoplifters' fraudulent credit cards etc.Skills
Skills: You will also be expected to maintain the Display Center’s visual and service standards. To be successful as a Sales Associate, you should have excellent communication skills in both English and Arabic, a friendly and outgoing personality, and a keen interest in fashion and luxury. You should also be able to work well in a team, handle multiple tasks, and adapt to different situations. You should have previous experience in retail sales, preferably in the luxury sector.
● Proven work experience as a Sales Associate, Retail Sales Associate, or similar role.
● Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and Arabic
● Knowledge of POS systems, cash handling, and basic math skills
● Strong interpersonal and customer service skills
● Ability to work independently and as part of a team
● Ability to work under pressure and remain open to changes
● Flexibility to work various shifts, including weekends and holidays
● In-depth understanding of the stories of Luxury Brands across the world
● Understanding of the retail sales process
● Familiarity with consumer behavior principles
● Knowledge of inventory stocking procedures
● Basic math and analytical skills
● Track record of achieving sales quotas
● Excellent communication skills, capable of building trusting relationships
● Ability to adapt and perform in a fast-paced environments
● Bachelor's degree in business, marketing, or a related field (preferred) or equivalent work experience.
● At least 3 years of experience in the relevant field (Sales)
● English and Arabic is preferred
Compensation & other benefits:
